viralPosts.text:
"It‚Äôs a vicious cycle; people attend unsafe #events. They become #disabled with #LongCOVID. They‚Äôre too sick to attend events. They‚Äôre too sick to demand safety and #accessibility.": buff.ly/7hZp4Un

by @juliadoubleday.bsky.social #ChronicIllness
viralPosts.author: achronicvoice.com

viralPosts.text:
This Thursday November 13th, I will be joining the OZeWAI (an Australian Web Accessibility initiative) on their Ask The Professionals Webinar to talk all about #ARIA, along with Rafal Charlampowicz and Andrew Downie. The session will be moderated by Russ Weakley.

#a11y
viralPosts.author: sarasoueidan.com

viralPosts.text:
Today I had to vote on a school bond to *bring local schools into compliance with the ADA." Read that again. 

I was 15 when the ADA passed and my old schools are STILL NOT ACCESSIBLE. I am 50 now, almost 51.

#CripTheVote
viralPosts.author: karriehiggins.bsky.social

viralPosts.text: Electronic machines that *also* produce a paper ballot are good, but using paper ballots only would make voting inaccessible to people who are blind/low vision. #CripTheVote

I finally get to announce that I wrote a chapter for the upcoming book titled ‚ÄúDigital Accessibility Ethics: Disability Inclusion in All Things Tech." The book will be published on March 26, 2026, and is available for pre-order 

#DigitalAccessibilityEthics #Ethics #accessibility #Disabilit
viralPosts.author: scopicengineer.com

viralPosts.text:
Hey! @lflegal.bsky.social, @rejinae.bsky.social, and @chanceyfleet.bsky.social gathered 36 authors to write about ethics in digital accessibility.

Chapters, authors (I‚Äôm one of them), pre-order:
www.routledge.com/Digital-Acce...

Out 26 March 2026.

#DigitalAccessibilityEthics #accessibility #a11y
